description: This file defines the interface 'ILocalStore' within the namespace WPEFramework::Plugin. The interface declares methods for managing a local storage system, including opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, counting entries, retrieving entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also defines a shared pointer alias 'ILocalStorePtr'.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface for a local key-value storage system with methods to manage tables and entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the storage at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the storage.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a specified range in a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting at a specified index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries within a specified range from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a table.
